title: [SOULSTEALER VAYNE] When.
body: guys when is soulstealer vayne  going to be available again, vayne is my main champ and I want to have that skin for her

replies.body: It's available right now, but it's a Hextech exclusive skin just like Hextech Annie.
enjoy spending 300 dollars on chests to get it
I spent 10$ and got her and i dont even play vayne little as adc

[Soulstealer Vayne](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/new-loot-soulstealer-vayne-and-hextech-ward) is currently available through Hextech Crafting.  As Zombiemaster mentioned, she will be exclusive similarly to Hextech Annie.  Let us know if you have any questions, and best of luck gearing up your Vayne main!
